path: music/smash\Super Smash Bros. Anthology Vol. 19 - Wii Fit (3DS, Wii U, Switch) (gamerip) (2014)\01. Main Menu - Wii Fit.mp3
description: Great remix! Wii Fit always had an excellent soundtrack in terms of vibes and this remix really takes it to the next level. I feel like it's very cheeky and camp. I remember being so excited about this remix when it played during Wii Fit's little introduction video for ultimate.
title: Main Menu
composers: Toru Minegishi, Manaka Tominaga, Shiho Fujii
album: Super Smash Bros. Anthology - Vol. 19: Wii Fit

path: music/smash\Super Smash Bros. Anthology Vol. 19 - Wii Fit (3DS, Wii U, Switch) (gamerip) (2014)\02. Super Hoop.mp3
description: Fantastic remix of a great track. It sounds so silly, like it knows that it kind sounds like music from an advert. It's just so fun and full of joy.
title: Super Hoop
composers: Toru Minegishi, Manaka Tominaga, Shiho Fujii
album: Super Smash Bros. Anthology - Vol. 19: Wii Fit

path: music/smash\Super Smash Bros. Anthology Vol. 19 - Wii Fit (3DS, Wii U, Switch) (gamerip) (2014)\03. Rhythm Boxing.mp3
description: It's fun but that cowbell really starts to grate after a while. Definitely can't put this on during a smash match because the cowbell is just that distracting. They didn't need to make it that loud.
title: Rhythm Boxing
composers: Toru Minegishi, Manaka Tominaga, Shiho Fujii
contributors: Toru Minegishi, Manaka Tominaga, Shiho Fujii
album: Super Smash Bros. Anthology - Vol. 19: Wii Fit

path: music/smash\Super Smash Bros. Anthology Vol. 19 - Wii Fit (3DS, Wii U, Switch) (gamerip) (2014)\04. Advanced Step.mp3
description: Huge track. It starts of simple enough but just wait, this track explodes into an incredible multi-phased celebration of that quintessential Nintendo Wii vibe. It just keeps going and getting better and I just can't get enough. Funnily enough, it doesn't sound like this in game, the smash team sped it up and I love that they did that.
title: Advanced Step
composers: Toru Minegishi, Manaka Tominaga, Shiho Fujii
contributors: Toru Minegishi, Manaka Tominaga, Shiho Fujii
album: Super Smash Bros. Anthology - Vol. 19: Wii Fit

path: music/smash\Super Smash Bros. Anthology Vol. 19 - Wii Fit (3DS, Wii U, Switch) (gamerip) (2014)\05. Yoga.mp3
description: Excellent choice of music that is just soooo funny to pick in tournament. This is so chill. When I listen to it I can imagine the lotus flowers blooming, single droplets of water dropping into a pond. This is Wii Fit's deep breathing as a piece of music. Love it.
title: Yoga
composers: Toru Minegishi, Manaka Tominaga, Shiho Fujii
contributors: Toru Minegishi, Manaka Tominaga, Shiho Fujii
album: Super Smash Bros. Anthology - Vol. 19: Wii Fit

path: music/smash\Super Smash Bros. Anthology Vol. 19 - Wii Fit (3DS, Wii U, Switch) (gamerip) (2014)\06. Skateboard Arena (Free Mode).mp3
description: I love that they remixed this track specifically. It's from a niche minigame but it was good material. They ended with this absolute banger over here, going for that Nintendo Wii style rock music. It's a lot of fun.
title: Skateboard Arena (Free Mode)
album: Super Smash Bros. Anthology - Vol. 19: Wii Fit

path: music/smash\Super Smash Bros. Anthology Vol. 19 - Wii Fit (3DS, Wii U, Switch) (gamerip) (2014)\07. Mischievous Mole-way.mp3
description: I think this one's a bit shit. It's just plain country style music with nothing going for it.
title: Mischievous Mole-way
album: Super Smash Bros. Anthology - Vol. 19: Wii Fit

path: music/smash\Super Smash Bros. Anthology Vol. 19 - Wii Fit (3DS, Wii U, Switch) (gamerip) (2014)\08. Wii Fit Plus Medley.mp3
description: Wow this must be one of the worst remixes I've ever heard. It's got these horrible vocals at the start, then it moves through all these different phases at break-neck pace. It's got no cohesion. I just can't get my head around it. It's terrible.
title: Wii Fit Plus Medley
album: Super Smash Bros. Anthology - Vol. 19: Wii Fit

path: music/smash\Super Smash Bros. Anthology Vol. 19 - Wii Fit (3DS, Wii U, Switch) (gamerip) (2014)\09. Training Menu - Wii Fit U.mp3
description: What a wild and wacky remix! It's very out-there and extreme. But what can I say, I kinda dig it. Towards the end a cool synth bass solo happens.
title: Training Menu
album: Super Smash Bros. Anthology - Vol. 19: Wii Fit

path: music/smash\Super Smash Bros. Anthology Vol. 19 - Wii Fit (3DS, Wii U, Switch) (gamerip) (2014)\10. Core Luge.mp3
description: This is a bit of a non-song. There's nothing to really listen to here. Very forgettable.
title: Core Luge
album: Super Smash Bros. Anthology - Vol. 19: Wii Fit
